name: Dwindle Down
description:
Dwindle Down: A game made for #CallumUptonJam. This was my 1st game and I had a great time making it. Will you be able to escape from the doomsday cults prison and reunite with your family?

Most of the assets come from this pack by pixel-poem.
https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck

Note: Because of some issue when exporting I had to include my src code folder. So if you wanted to can look through the code. I would not recommend it however because it became spaghetti in the end and nothing is commented.
